description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Graviton AI is an innovative hybrid of strategy elements and classic side scroll shoot-em ups. This is a game in which the strategic selection of weaponary and equipment are just as important to victory as adrenalin and quick reflexes!
description.short: Graviton AI is an innovative hybrid of strategy elements and classic side scroll shoot-em ups. This is a game in which the strategic selection of weaponary and equipment are just as important to victory as adrenalin and quick reflexes!
